general.name: First Steps
general.description: Survive your first day in the dungeon
general.effect: +1 to Constitution

general.name: Murder Hobo
general.description: Kill everything that moves without asking questions first
general.effect: +2 to Attack Damage, -1 to Charisma (Social consequences)

general.name: Lucky Bastard
general.description: Survive three situations that should have killed you
general.effect: +2 to all saving throws

general.name: Crowd Pleaser
general.description: Gain 1000 viewers in a single episode
general.effect: +1 to Charisma, +10% experience from social interactions

general.name: Viral Sensation
general.description: Become a trending topic across the galaxy
general.effect: +2 to Charisma, sponsors offer better deals

general.name: Dungeon Veteran
general.description: Clear 5 floors without dying
general.effect: +1 to all stats, +5% damage to dungeon creatures

general.name: Floor Boss Slayer
general.description: Defeat your first floor boss
general.effect: +2 to Strength, +10% damage to boss creatures

general.name: Creative Killer
general.description: Kill an enemy using an improvised weapon
general.effect: +1 to Dexterity, improvised weapons deal +1 damage

general.name: Pacifist Run
general.description: Clear a floor without directly killing anything
general.effect: +2 to Wisdom, +1 to Charisma, stealth abilities improved

general.name: Hoarder
general.description: Carry 50 different items at once
general.effect: +5 inventory slots, +1 to Intelligence

general.name: Minimalist
general.description: Clear a floor with only basic equipment
general.effect: +1 to all stats when using basic equipment

general.name: Speed Runner
general.description: Clear a floor in record time
general.effect: +2 to Dexterity, +10% movement speed

general.name: Explorer
general.description: Discover 10 secret areas
general.effect: +1 to Wisdom, +20% chance to find secret areas

general.name: Treasure Hunter
general.description: Find 100 pieces of loot
general.effect: +1 to Intelligence, +15% better loot quality

general.name: Social Butterfly
general.description: Successfully negotiate with 20 different NPCs
general.effect: +2 to Charisma, NPCs start with better disposition

general.name: Lone Wolf
general.description: Survive 10 floors without party members
general.effect: +1 to all stats when alone, +10% damage when solo

general.name: Team Player
general.description: Save a party member's life 5 times
general.effect: +1 to Wisdom, party members gain +1 to all saves

general.name: Death Defier
general.description: Survive with 1 HP three times
general.effect: Gain 'Last Stand' ability - +50% damage when below 10% HP

general.name: Spell Slinger
general.description: Cast 100 spells successfully
general.effect: +1 to Intelligence, -10% spell costs

general.name: Mana Burn
general.description: Exhaust your magic points 10 times
general.effect: +2 to Magic Points, faster mana regeneration

general.name: Berserker
general.description: Deal 500 damage in a single combat
general.effect: +2 to Strength, rage abilities last longer

skill_based.name: Electrical Expert
skill_based.description: Master the art of electrical repair in the dungeon
skill_based.effect: +2 to Basic Electrical Repair skill, electrical devices work better

skill_based.name: Bomb Disposal Unit
skill_based.effect: +3 to IED skill, +2 to Bomb Surgeon skill

skill_based.name: Nine Lives Master
skill_based.description: Use all 9 lives and still survive

skill_based.name: Cockroach Survivor
skill_based.description: Survive in conditions that would kill anyone else
skill_based.effect: +3 to Cockroach skill, immunity to most environmental hazards

skill_based.name: Remote Control Master
skill_based.description: Use the Sony remote to control 50 different devices
skill_based.effect: +5 to Operating Sony RMVLZ620 Universal Remote skill, can control alien tech

skill_based.name: Method Actor
skill_based.effect: +3 to Character Actor skill, can maintain disguises indefinitely

skill_based.name: Irresistible Charm
skill_based.effect: +3 to Love Vampire skill, charm effects last twice as long

skill_based.name: Master Navigator
skill_based.description: Never get lost in the dungeon
skill_based.effect: +3 to Pathfinder skill, always know the fastest route

skill_based.name: Iron Stomach Gourmand
skill_based.description: Eat 100 different questionable foods without getting sick
skill_based.effect: +3 to Iron Stomach skill, gain nutrition from any organic matter

skill_based.name: Feline Grace
skill_based.description: Dodge 100 attacks that should have hit
skill_based.effect: +3 to Cat-like Reflexes skill, +2 to Dexterity

race_based.name: Human Adaptability
race_based.description: Prove that humans can survive anything
race_based.effect: +1 to all stats, can learn any skill regardless of restrictions

race_based.name: Elven Grace
race_based.description: Move through the dungeon like a whisper

race_based.name: Dwarven Resilience
race_based.description: Withstand punishment that would fell giants
race_based.effect: +3 to Constitution, resistance to all damage types

race_based.name: Orcish Fury
race_based.description: Channel your rage into devastating attacks
race_based.effect: +3 to Strength, critical hits deal double damage

race_based.name: Galactic Diplomat
race_based.effect: +3 to Charisma, can end combat through diplomacy

race_based.name: Ace Pilot
race_based.description: Master aerial combat in the dungeon
race_based.effect: +2 to Dexterity, +5 to all pilot skills, aerial attacks deal +50% damage

race_based.name: Tunnel Rat
race_based.description: Navigate the dungeon's hidden passages like a native
race_based.effect: +2 to Wisdom, can find secret passages automatically

race_based.name: Demonic Evolution
race_based.effect: Wings grow faster, +2 to Charisma, fire immunity

race_based.name: Primal Ascendant
race_based.description: Unlock the true power of the first species
race_based.effect: All skills can reach level 25, +1 to all stats

race_based.name: Alpha Predator
race_based.description: Become the apex predator of your species
race_based.effect: +3 to Strength, shape-shifting is instant, pack leadership abilities

class_based.name: Revolutionary Leader
class_based.description: Lead a successful uprising against the system
class_based.effect: +2 to Charisma, can inspire allies to fight harder

class_based.name: Heavyweight Champion
class_based.description: Win 10 fights using only your fists
class_based.effect: +3 to Strength, unarmed attacks deal weapon damage

class_based.name: Entertainment Empire
class_based.description: Build a multimedia empire in the dungeon
class_based.effect: +3 to Charisma, passive income from fans

class_based.name: Comeback Kid
class_based.description: Prove you're more than just a former child star
class_based.effect: +2 to Charisma, +1 to Dexterity, performance abilities improved

class_based.name: Riot Leader
class_based.description: Start and lead a successful riot
class_based.effect: +2 to Strength, +2 to Charisma, crowd control abilities

class_based.name: Road Warrior
class_based.effect: +3 to Constitution, vehicles take 50% less damage

class_based.name: Cloud Master
class_based.effect: +1 to Charisma, can create concealing clouds

class_based.name: Mind Reader
class_based.effect: +3 to Wisdom, can read surface thoughts

class_based.name: Grove Master
class_based.description: Grow a banana grove in the dungeon
class_based.effect: +2 to Wisdom, can grow food anywhere

class_based.name: Death Song
class_based.description: Compose a song that can raise the dead
class_based.effect: +2 to Charisma, +2 to Intelligence, undead obey your music

class_based.name: Feral Master
class_based.description: Achieve perfect balance between civilization and savagery
class_based.effect: +3 to Dexterity, can enter feral state at will

class_based.name: Beneficial Mutation
class_based.description: Develop a positive mutation from all the testing
class_based.effect: +2 to Constitution, immunity to poisons, green glow provides light

class_based.name: Magical Overcharge
class_based.description: Channel more magic than should be possible
class_based.effect: +3 to Intelligence, can cast spells above your level

class_based.name: Legendary Performance
class_based.description: Give a performance that will be remembered forever
class_based.effect: +5 to Charisma, performances can affect reality

class_based.name: Apex Predator
class_based.description: Become the most feared predator in the dungeon
class_based.effect: +2 to Dexterity, +2 to Constitution, poison is 100% lethal

weapon_based.name: Home Run Slugger
weapon_based.description: Hit 100 enemies with a baseball bat
weapon_based.effect: Baseball bats deal +2 damage, chance to knock enemies back

weapon_based.name: Master Chef
weapon_based.description: Prepare 100 meals with your kitchen knife
weapon_based.effect: Kitchen knives can be thrown, +1 to cooking skills

weapon_based.name: Problem Solver
weapon_based.description: Use a crowbar to solve 50 different problems
weapon_based.effect: Crowbars can open any door, +2 to problem-solving

weapon_based.name: Marksman
weapon_based.description: Make 100 accurate shots with a pistol
weapon_based.effect: Pistols have +2 accuracy, can ricochet shots

weapon_based.name: Room Clearer
weapon_based.description: Clear 20 rooms using only a shotgun
weapon_based.effect: Shotguns deal area damage, +50% damage at close range

weapon_based.name: Demolition Expert
weapon_based.effect: Grenades have larger blast radius, can craft improvised explosives

weapon_based.name: Alien Technology Master
weapon_based.description: Master the use of alien plasma weapons

weapon_based.name: Executioner
weapon_based.effect: Vorpal weapons have +20% critical chance, crits are always lethal

weapon_based.name: Improvised Weapon Master
weapon_based.effect: Any object can be used as a weapon, +1 damage with improvised weapons

absurd.name: Speed Lacing Champion
absurd.description: Lace your boots faster than anyone in galactic history
absurd.effect: +1 to Dexterity, can change equipment instantly

absurd.name: Zen Master
absurd.effect: +2 to Wisdom, can hold breath indefinitely

absurd.name: Traffic Master
absurd.description: Cross 100 dangerous areas without taking damage
absurd.effect: +2 to Dexterity, immunity to movement-based damage

absurd.name: Crowd Favorite
absurd.description: Become the most beloved mascot in the galaxy
absurd.effect: +3 to Charisma, crowds will protect you

absurd.name: Ultimate Collector
absurd.effect: +2 to Intelligence, can identify any heraldry instantly

absurd.name: Universal Hacker
absurd.description: Hack into alien systems using a TV remote
absurd.effect: Can control any electronic device, +3 to hacking

absurd.name: Treasure Finder Supreme
absurd.description: Find 500 pieces of metal in the dungeon
absurd.effect: +2 to Wisdom, can detect valuable items through walls

absurd.name: Galactic Peace Maker
absurd.effect: +3 to Charisma, can end any conflict through words

absurd.name: Reflex Master
absurd.effect: +3 to Dexterity, can catch any projectile

legendary.name: Dungeon Conqueror
legendary.description: Clear all 18 floors of the World Dungeon
legendary.effect: +5 to all stats, legendary status among crawlers

legendary.name: Syndicate Rebel
legendary.description: Successfully rebel against the Borant Corporation
legendary.effect: +3 to all stats, can inspire others to rebel

legendary.name: Primal Awakening
legendary.description: Unlock the true power of the universe's first species
legendary.effect: Transcend normal limitations, gain cosmic awareness

legendary.name: Champion of Earth
legendary.description: Represent humanity's best hope for survival
legendary.effect: +3 to all stats, other humans gain bonuses near you

legendary.name: Galactic Superstar
legendary.description: Become the most watched crawler in galactic history
legendary.effect: +5 to Charisma, reality bends to make you more entertaining

legendary.name: Death Cheater
legendary.description: Survive 100 situations that should have been fatal
legendary.effect: Immunity to instant death, +3 to Constitution

legendary.name: System Breaker
legendary.description: Break the dungeon's rules in a way that changes everything
legendary.effect: Can ignore one system limitation permanently

legendary.name: Mentor of Crawlers
legendary.description: Train 10 other crawlers to survive the dungeon
legendary.effect: +2 to Wisdom, +2 to Charisma, teaching abilities

legendary.name: Dungeon Architect
legendary.description: Understand the true nature of the dungeon's construction
legendary.effect: +3 to Intelligence, can predict dungeon layouts

legendary.name: Cosmic Comedian
legendary.description: Make the entire galaxy laugh at your antics
legendary.effect: +5 to Charisma, humor can affect reality
